Rodimus:

The door opened and rodimus looked her kidnly, she looked nervous=
 he though.

  Silence::

  She felt the axe dr=
op on the back of her neck. In a slightly unsteady
  tone, " uh, yes sir. I=
 will be there presently." Great, now I am to
  get the punishment I so ris=
hly deserve for my insulence earlier to a
  superior officer, he may be a d=
ecepticreep, but he's still my
  superior, she thought as she made her way =
to his office. If her sence
  of honor wasn't at stake, she'd fly away. Get=
ting a 'tongue lashing'
  wasn't her idea of fun, but she deserved it.  She=
 walked over and
  knocked on the door to his office. "I am here sir."
